00387 /* Fixed-point math settings  */
00388 
00389 #define XY_FIXED_SHIFT 16 
00390 #define XY_FIXED_SHIFT_HALF 8 
00391 #define XY_FIXED_ONE (1 << XY_FIXED_SHIFT) 
00392 #define XY_FIXED_HALF (1 << (XY_FIXED_SHIFT - 1)) 
00394 /* Limits for fixed-point values (for signed 32-bit ints) */
00395 
00396 #define XY_FIXED_MAX 0x7FFFFFFF 
00397 #define XY_FIXED_MIN -(0x80000000) 
00398 #define XY_FIXED_NAN XY_FIXED_MAX

01032 #define XY_mult(a,b) (((a) >> XY_FIXED_SHIFT_HALF) * \
01033                       ((b) >> XY_FIXED_SHIFT_HALF))
01034 
01042 #define XY_qdiv(a,b) (((a) / \
01043                        ((b) >> XY_FIXED_SHIFT_HALF)) \
01044                       << XY_FIXED_SHIFT_HALF)
01045 
01055 #define XY_div(a,b) (((b) >> XY_FIXED_SHIFT_HALF) == 0 ? \
01056                      XY_FIXED_NAN : XY_qdiv((a),(b)))
01057 
01063 #define XY_FIXED_DIV_ZERO ((1 << XY_FIXED_SHIFT_HALF) - 1)
01064 
01068 #define XY_fpart(a) ((a) & (XY_FIXED_ONE - 1))
01069 
01073 #define XY_rfpart(a) (XY_FIXED_ONE - XY_fpart(a))
01074 
01078 #define XY_ipart(a) ((a) - XY_fpart(a))
01079 
01083 #define XY_round(a) (XY_ipart((a) + (1 << (XY_FIXED_SHIFT - 1))))
